channel.title: AJDT News
channel.description: The latest news and developments for AJDT, the Eclipse tooling for AspectJ.

item.title: Translations available
item.description: Translations have been contributed for AJDT 1.3.0. Please see the New Features page for more details.

item.title: AspectJ 5 M5
item.description: The latest AspectJ milestone release is now included in AJDT development builds. Please see the New Features page for more details.

item.title: Load-time weaving
item.description: AJDT 1.2.1 and 1.3 now provide support for load-time weaving your applications in Eclipse. Please see the New Features page for more details.

item.title: Accessibility
item.description: AJDT 1.3 has undergone a full accessibility review in anticipation of the upcoming release. Please see the New Features page for more details.

item.title: AspectJ 5 M4
item.description: The latest AspectJ milestone release is now included in AJDT development builds. Please see the New Features page for more details.

item.title: Internationalization - call for help!
item.description: Recently we have been focusing on support for message translations in AJDT. But we need your help with this - please see the New Features page for details of how you can help.

item.title: Another new feature: Crosscutting Comparison view
item.description: This new view and related functionality helps you manage changes to the crosscutting structure of your project.

item.title: This week's new AJDT feature: Updated New Aspect Wizard
item.description: The New Aspect wizard now more closely matches the appearance and functionality of the New Class wizard, plus it can generate stubs for pointcuts inherited from an abstract aspect.

item.title: More new features in AJDT: Cross References Filter and upgraded compiler
item.description: The New Features page has been updated to cover the filtering capability added to the Cross References view. The version of the AspectJ compiler included in AJDT has also been updated to the latest development build.

item.title: New features in AJDT: Pointcut navigation and source hovers
item.description: Find out more about the latest new features added to AJDT development builds from the New Features page, starting this week with support for navigation and source hovers for pointcuts.

item.title: developerWorks article published: New AJDT releases ease AOP development
item.description: This article explores AJDT 1.2 and 1.3, the latest releases of the AspectJ development tools for Eclipse 3.0 and 3.1, respectively. The major focus of these releases is to more closely integrate AspectJ with the Eclipse platform and to offer AspectJ developers more of the advanced tooling support available to Javaâ„¢ developers using Eclipse.

item.title: AJDT 1.2 released for Eclipse 3.0
item.description: The stable release is now here! See the New and Noteworthy for a summary of the changes since version 1.1. The release is available from the update site and as a zip file. See the AJDT download page for more information.
